cause.description:
This is a secret society.... You can only join if you have done the Gabba at about 100bpm!! If you don't know what Gabba is.... YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO JOIN...
1. Global warming is a good thing.
2. Stop eating yellow snow.
3. KFC is a sub division of the FBI
cause.mission: Spread and teach the Gabba to Africa and the world!!
cause.name: Get the Gabba into the olympic games.
